ol.li: The reagents contain chemical components as previously described (For details see 2. PRECAUTIONS FOR HANDLING). Follow any applicable regulations for disposal. If flushing down the drain, use generous amount of water when discarding to prevent the formation of explosive metal azides. Do not use acids to decontaminate the waste, since sodium azide with acids liberates toxic gases.
Handle any medical waste produced by this assay in compliance with waste-related regulations in each country or region.

When any liquid such as specimen or assay waste is splashed, wipe and disinfect the whole area with an appropriate disinfectant such as sodium hypochlorite or ethanol, conforming to the instituteâ€™s biosafety requirements.
